overview: A young and smart woman comes into a hotel. She is mysterious, and seems to be waiting for something while sheâ€™s preparing for it. She puts on some make-up, brushes her hair, walks inside the room without leaving it. Slowly the screen splits and her body breaks up, the space becomes abstract and the identity of the young woman seems confused. In the early morning, Maria Valdes is missed and the hotel room is desperately empty.
title: La Mort de Maria Valdes
